name: Miller Rubben
description: I’m a very gentleman and will always be. I look for simple pleasures and not so simple pleasures in life. really very simple, love the nature, and mostly want to get on with life.. my daughter make me do this. LOL searching for my half, someone i can share all my feelings and thoughts with, someone i can Cherish and Adore forever. I’m a good listener and promise never to be a dictator.
